Name: Small Healing Kit
Description: A small healing kit that is enough to heal small wounds for everyone in the team.

Name: Medium Healing Kit
Description: A medium healing kit essential for dangerous journey. Capable of fixing moderate wounds for all nearby allies.

Name: Large Healing Kit
Description: A large healing kit capable of fixing serious wounds. A mandatory tool for war surgeons.

Name: Great Healing Kit
Description: A great healing kit all patients will be happy to see. The kit is filled with all kind of medical tools and medicines.

Name: Weather Idol
Description: This weather idol is cursed with a witch's magic. Capable of invoking weather-changing effects that are impossible to predict.

Name: Sun Idol
Description: Idol of the Sun filled with magic to blow the bad weather away. Changing the weather to a clear day.

Name: Monster Caller
Description: Call a bunch of random creatures. They will attack everyone in sight except among themselves.

Name: Invasion Caller
Description: Let loose the the locust of war. There is no order in a battle. Calling huge numbers of random creatures from somewhere to fight against everyone.
